lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia Eagles have released defensive end Jevon Kearse after four mostly disappointing and injury-plagued seasons. The Eagles signed him to a $66 million deal in 2004 that at the time made him the highest-paid defensive end in N.F.L. history. He ended up being benched last season.
